title: [EUW] Gold/Platin Team LF Scrim/-Partner (Gold+) Timezone:UTC+ 1 for Tuesday & Thursday at 7pm
body:
Hi
We are a Gold/Plat Team that looks for a Scrim/-Partner for 
-Tuesday the 6th of August &
-Thursday the 8th of August
Best of 3
You should preferrably be Gold + but not requiered.

My Ign is Skoriox. If im available you could reach out to Th3xile, VTG De4ThSkiVe or Umbra Abyssum
